Neuro-Feedback

Neuro-Feedback is an ever-growing business model that can be a great service to offer to your patients. While we don’t teach neuro-feedback protocols, we have streamlined the education process by automating the patient educating process. Stress no more, you can now push play and go about working on your business while your patient learns about dysregulated brain waves. 

In addition, we have streamlined the gut-brain connection by automating the metabolic component online for the doctor and the patient with our virtual patient management system. Have your patients go through a fully automated functional medicine protocol that tracks the patient, keeps them accountable, and gives them the option to communicate with the clinic virtually.

[/oxy_rich_text][/ct_div_block_4][/ct_div_block_3][/ct_div_block_2][/ct_section]
